metadata.description:
This internationally acclaimed graphic novel was named one of Les Essentiels D'Angouleme (the 5 'Essential' graphic novels of the Angouleme International Comics Festival) and recipient of the prestigious René Goscinny Prize. 

Author Ludovic Debeurme takes on the difficult world of adolescence, following the life of a young anorexic woman and her troubled relationships. 

Debeurme explores life and fantasies with elegant clean graphics and a profound love of the games of childhood.
metadata.name: Lucille
